Summary: My family and I were driving to Boone in the Mountians of NC on Hwy 421,we watch this wonderful cloud and took several pics.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Boone
There were no other sightings in Boone on or around March 4th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsThursday March 4th 2010 Driving into the NC mountians on hwy 421 into Boone. We saw this really cool cloud and pulled over to take some pics of it. We watch it for an hour as we were driving before the pics were made.
